data.sectionContent: A consider music as something that is always there to make my day a little bit better. I like almost every music style, but here you can get some of the styles I been listening lately.

sectionItems.sectionItemContent: I like Reggaeton music because even though lyrics can be a little bit... inappropriate, it has good rhythm and melody. It is also very catchy.
What I like the most about Trap music are beats. I like instruments combination and the way they match what the rapper is trying to communicate.

data.sectionContent: I'm not that picky about food, but here are listed some of the dishes or 'types' of food that I like the most.

sectionItems.sectionItemContent: I really like the combination of ingredients. I feel like every dish has a special combination where each ingredient fits perfectly.

What is amazing about Mexican Cuisine is that has a large variety of dishes. You can get dishes with differect characteristics like spicy, sweet, meat, vegetables, soups, creamy, seafood and all what you can imagine.
I don't really know much about Brazilian food, but what I can tell is that Coxinha is really really good.

data.sectionContent: I used to have a ton of hobbies but due to school and work I do not have that much time anymore. Here I show you some of my favorite hobbies ever.

sectionItems.sectionItemContent: I'm always learning new things every day. I enjoy the process of learning and getting new knowledge. Every time I learn something new I feel a bit wiser.
I don't play video games too much, but I enjoy doing it if I play with friends because it makes it funnier.
I like pretty much every sport. I think an excellent way to relieve stress and have fun at the same time.
